sentence.Network_en: High temperature water will scald children while unboiled water causes diarrhea.
sentence.Network_cn: 水温太高怕烫伤,不加热直接饮用又怕太凉闹肚子,真让人操心.

sentence.Network_en: He proposes not to drink unboiled water.
Though warned by the authority S , Tschaikovsky drank some unboiled water on November 2.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然当局发出过警告,但是柴可夫斯基在11月2日那一天还是喝了一些生水.
